location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 163: Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Commodore George Robinson, Commander of the Persian Gulf Squadron, Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, requests a passage to Bombay, on board the HC brig Euphrates, on behalf of two emancipated slaves, both of whom are children.
